short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for data sync using Chrome storage. Functions as domain-specific key-value mapping. By Pankaj Bahuguna.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A straightforward Chrome extension for data synchronization utilizing Chrome storage. Essentially, it functions as a key-value mapping specific to a particular domain. Once utilized, there's no need to manually organize or remember scattered notes; everything is consolidated in one location, eliminating the hassle of searching for specific entries.Developed By Pankaj Bahuguna
